title: Late Night Ranked Player Base.
body: What is it with people that are up at these hours hard inting games and being absolutely abhorrent in chat. Honestly, I don't give a shit if your 50% win rate gold 1 account "isn't your main", or the fact that you are a paired with a gold 3 player while in plat 2 with a 52% win rate. If you can't play your role don't stay quiet until you inevitably start losing the game and then come out swinging when you go 4/8/2 and 4/8/3 respectively in a 20 minute game just to state that you "hate gold players". Cause THAT'S the reason you hard inted, good one buddy!

replies.body: i played ranked for first time on a saturday night, i normally play mornings during the week, ive actually never seen such clowns, people were afk 2 out of 3 games, forcing a remake, then the game that there wasnt an afk it was just trolls

> [{quoted}](name=El Gringos,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AqbELAcq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-24T01:51:58.412+0000)
>
> i played ranked for first time on a saturday night, i normally play mornings during the week, ive actually never seen such clowns, people were afk 2 out of 3 games, forcing a remake, then the game that there wasnt an afk it was just trolls

Yea I don't know, I might be slightly over exaggerating I guess but it definitely feels as though all the "sickest lads" are on at these times flexing their "I'm better than a gold player, I don't care this is just my smurf account" attitudes. I honestly prefer games where no one talks, and it's just pinging. But you get that one guy that's super optimistic in champion select which turns out to be the biggest %%%% in the game if things don't turn out alright.

Fun fact:
The people saying this are usually people whos alts are in bronze/iron and gave up on them because messed up mmr so theyve bought a new account.
But why purchase an account, why not just make a new one? I mean, I guess the time it takes to level it is pretty consuming but other than that it couldn't be that worth it?

It really isn't worth it, but people are lazy. 
Inta ranked ready account with untainted mmr? 
Ill take that.
